text: Map of Bahrain showing Al Mintaqah al Gharbiyah municipality Western Region (Arabic: المنطقة الغربية Al-Minṭaqat al-Ḡarbiyya) was a municipality (mintaqah) of Bahrain in the western part of the country. Its territory is now in the Northern and Southern Governorates. == See also == * Al Gharbiyah Category:Former municipalities (regions) of Bahrain
title: Western Region, Bahrain
